verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of the sons of Korah.) <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H384>this,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>peoples;<s%> <S%H238>Give<s%> <S%H238>ear,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H2465>world,<s%>
<S%H1571>Both<s%> <S%H1121>low<s%> <S%H120><s%> and <S%H1121>high,<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H6223>Rich<s%> and <S%H34>poor<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>
My <S%H6310>mouth<s%> will <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> And the <S%H1900>meditation<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%> [will be] <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>
I will <S%H5186>incline<s%> my <S%H241>ear<s%> to a <S%H4912>proverb;<s%> I will <S%H6605>express<s%> my <S%H2420>riddle<s%> on the <S%H3658>harp.<s%>
<S%H4100>Why<s%> should I <S%H3372>fear<s%> in <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H9563>adversity,<s%> When the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of my <S%H6120>foes<s%> <S%H5437>surrounds<s%> me,
Even those who <S%H982>trust<s%> in their <S%H2428>wealth,<s%> And <S%H1984>boast<s%> in the <S%H7230>abundance<s%> of their <S%H6239>riches<s%>?

<S%H3808>No<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> can by <S%H6299>any<s%> <S%H6299>means<s%> <S%H6299>redeem<s%> [his] <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H3808>Or<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> a <S%H3724>ransom<s%> for him –
For the <S%H9445>redemption<s%> of his <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H3365>costly,<s%> And he should <S%H2308>cease<s%> [trying] <S%H5769>forever<s%> –
That he should <S%H2421>live<s%> on <S%H5331>eternally;<s%> That he should not <S%H7845>undergo<s%> <S%H7845>decay.<s%>

For he <S%H7200>sees<s%> [that even] <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2450>men<s%> <S%H4191>die;<s%> The <S%H3684>stupid<s%> and the <S%H1198>senseless<s%> <S%H3162>alike<s%> perish, And <S%H6>leave<s%> their <S%H5800>wealth<s%> to <S%H2428>others.<s%>

Their <S%H7130>inner<s%> <S%H7130>thought<s%> is, [that] their <S%H1004>houses<s%> are <S%H5769>forever,<s%> [And] their <S%H4908>dwelling<s%> <S%H4908>places<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations;<s%> They have <S%H7121>called<s%> their <S%H127>lands<s%> after their own <S%H8034>names.<s%>
But <S%H120>man<s%> in [his] <S%H3366>pomp<s%> will not <S%H3885>endure;<s%> He is <S%H4911>like<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> that <S%H1820>perish.<s%>
<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1870>way<s%> of those who are <S%H3689>foolish,<s%> And of those <S%H310>after<s%> them who <S%H7521>approve<s%> their <S%H6310>words.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

As <S%H6629>sheep<s%> they are <S%H8371>appointed<s%> for <S%H7585>Sheol;<s%> <S%H4194>Death<s%> shall be their <S%H7462>shepherd;<s%> And the <S%H3477>upright<s%> shall <S%H7287>rule<s%> over them in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> And their <S%H6736>form<s%> shall be for <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> to <S%H1086>consume,<s%> <S%H4480>So<s%> that they have <S%H4480>no<s%> <S%H2073>habitation.<s%>
But <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H6299>redeem<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of <S%H7585>Sheol;<s%> For He will <S%H3947>receive<s%> me. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
Do not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6238>becomes<s%> <S%H6238>rich,<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> is <S%H7235>increased;<s%>
For <S%H3588>when<s%> he <S%H4194>dies<s%> he will <S%H3947>carry<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3605><s%> away; His <S%H9202>glory<s%> will not <S%H3381>descend<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him.

<S%H3588>Though<s%> while he <S%H9132>lives<s%> he <S%H1288>congratulates<s%> <S%H5315>himself<s%> – And though [men] <S%H3034>praise<s%> you <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H3190>do<s%> <S%H3190>well<s%> for yourself –
He shall <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of his fathers; They shall <S%H1>never<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5331>see<s%> the <S%H7200>light.<s%>
<S%H120>Man<s%> in [his] <S%H3366>pomp,<s%> yet <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H995>understanding,<s%> Is <S%H4911>like<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> that <S%H1820>perish.<s%>
